product.description: Tealight tree works well with most PartyLite Hurricanes. Coated metal. 8 1/4" (21 cm) h, 3 1/4" (8 cm) base diam.
product.name: Universal Tealight Tree

product.description: All eyes are on you! Ghoulish glances glow red when lit with a pillar candle or tealight tree, not included. Sprayed-black glass sleeve with metal base. 9 1/2" (24 cm) h, 6" (15 cm) dia.
product.name: Spooky Eyes Hurricane

product.description: Welcome the seasons with different motifs. Includes 6 decorative magnetic panels including 2 each of fall leaves, winter snowflakes and spider webs. Includes votive cup. 5 3/4" (15 cm) h, 3 1/2" (9 cm) sq.
product.name: Change-O-Luminary

product.description: Glows with the soft shimmer of eight colours – pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. Uses two D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control, sold separately.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing Outdoor LED 6" x 12" (15 x 30 cm) Pillar- Remote Control Ready

product.description: A realistic cast metal tree branch blends with pillar tray for a casual, earthy look. Black powdercoat finish. 4 1/2" (11 cm) h, 7" (18 cm) w.
product.name: Gaia Branch Pillar Holder

product.description: Set includes three sizes of pillars to create a visually pleasing display that glows with the shimmer of eight colours — pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Each pillar features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. One 6"x6" (15x15 cm), 6"x9" (15x23 cm) and 6"x12" (15x30 cm), plus remote control. Uses six D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing Outdoor LED Pillar Set with Remote

product.description: Use with remote control ready Light Illusions™ LED Pillars. Controls all functions. Battery included.
product.name: Remote Control for Light Illusions™ LED Pillars

product.description: Glows with the soft shimmer of eight colours – pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. Uses two D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control, sold separately.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing Outdoor LED 6" x 9" (15 x 23 cm) Pillar- Remote Control Ready

product.description: Favourite fall fragrance is presented in a fun, pumpkin-print glass jar. Highly fragranced Hocus Pocus wax fills the air with the scent of coconuts and pralines. Burn time: 30-40 hours. 3 1/4" (8 cm) h, 2 3/4" (7 cm) dia. Jar is safe for food use after candle has consumed.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Novelty Halloween Jar

product.description: Favourite fall fragrance is presented in a spooky, bat-motif glass jar. Highly fragranced Halloween Night wax fills the air with the scent of rich butterscotch, vanilla and spice. Burn time: 30-40 hours. 3 1/4" (8 cm) h, 2 3/4" (7 cm) dia. Jar is safe for food use after candle has consumed.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Novelty Halloween Jar

product.description: Glows with the soft shimmer of eight colours – pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. Uses two D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control, sold separately.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing Outdoor LED 6" x 6" (15 x 15 cm) Pillar- Remote Control Ready

product.description: Enjoy 80 hours of fragrance from our most highly-scented Melts. Each tray snaps into nine Melts. Create a custom fragrance with two different Melts. Use in our ScentGlow™ or Fragrance Warmers, sold separately. Available in dozens of exclusive fragrances including rich and creamy Halloween Night™ – butterscotch, vanilla and spices stirred into warm caramel.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Scent Plus™ Melts

product.description: Rich butterscotch, vanilla and spices are slowly stirred into a batch of warm, sugary caramel. It's a gooey, creamy, sinfully sweet treat. Combine pillars of different heights and finishes with a wide selection of PartyLite holders to transform your living space. 3" x 5" (7 x 12 cm) Burn time 65 - 70 hours
product.name: Halloween Night Grooved Pillar

product.description: Enjoy 80 hours of fragrance from our most highly-scented Melts. Each tray snaps into nine Melts. Create a custom fragrance with two different Melts. Use in our ScentGlow™ or Fragrance Warmers, sold separately. Available in dozens of exclusive fragrances including magical Hocus Pocus™ - a Halloween surprise of coconut and praline blended with sugar berries, grapefruit and floral notes.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Scent Plus™ Melts

product.description: Coconut and praline add an unexpected twist to this mysterious blend of sugar berries, grapefruit and floral notes. It's a magical Halloween surprise! Box of six votives comes with 3 purple and 3 yellow votives, both in Hocus Pocus Fragrance. Burn time: 8-11 hours.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Votives

product.description: Rich butterscotch, vanilla and spices are slowly stirred into a batch of warm, sugary caramel. Our votives are available in dozens of PartyLite’s exclusive fragrances. Burn time: 8-11 hours.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Votives

product.description: A haunted Halloween scene adorns the decal wrapped around this spooky pair of food safe glass votive cups. Use with tealights, votives or your favourite treats, sold separately. 2 3/4" (7 cm) h, 2 1/4" (6 cm) dia.
product.name: Halloween Night Votive Pair

product.description: Each petite pumpkin with a decorative neckband delivers our most highly fragranced wax. Includes one of each scent, Ginger Pumpkin, Leaves of Fun™ and Spiced Cider, in a decorative gift box. 2 1/2" (6 cm) h, 2 1/2" (6 cm) dia. Burn time: 30-40 hours each. Jars are safe for food use after candle has consumed.
product.name: Joy of Autumn Scented Candle Trio

product.description: Tealights are perfect for layering fragrance and creating multiple points of light with our beautiful selection of home accents. Available in dozens of PartyLite's exclusive fragrances including the smooth scent of Halloween Night™ - a creamy blend of butterscotch, vanilla, caramel and spices fills the air with a rich sweetness. Featuring our patented Universal tealight cup, tealights will completely liquefy while burning. Tealight cup is recyclable. Burn Time: 4-6 hours.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Universal Tealight® Candles

product.description: Celebrate the season with this contemporary white pumpkin that releases fragrance without the flame. Electric warming plate diffuses the fragrance of Scent Plus™ Melts or scented oil, all sold separately. Hidden LED provides a welcoming glow. Includes three glazed ceramic pieces; interior of base is orange. Use without the lid for a stronger scent. 6" (15 cm) h, 5 1/4" (13 cm) base dia.
product.name: ScentGlow™ Warmer Autumn Pumpkin

product.description: Coconut and praline add an unexpected twist to this mysterious blend of sugar berries, grapefruit and floral notes. It's a magical Halloween surprise. Featuring our patented Universal tealight cup, tealights will completely liquefy while burning. Tealight cup is recyclable. Burn Time: 4-6 hours.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Universal Tealight® Candles

product.description: Textured unscented ivory pillar radiates an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in colour and texture may occur. Burn time: 80-100 hrs.
product.name: Unscented Ivory GloLite 3" x 6" (7 x 15 cm) GloLite by PartyLite Pillar

product.description: Textured ivory pillars radiate an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in color and texture may occur. Includes one pillar in each size: 3”x4” (7 x 10 cm), 3”x5” (7 x 12 cm) and 3”x6” (7 x 15 cm).
product.name: Unscented Ivory GloLite by PartyLite™ 3-Piece Pillar Garden

product.description: Textured unscented ivory pillar radiates an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in colour and texture may occur. Burn time: 60-75 hrs.
product.name: Unscented Ivory GloLite 3" x 5" (7 x 12 cm) GloLite by PartyLite Pillar

product.description: Magnetic accessory pieces get the Bones gang into the spirit! A true conversation piece.
product.name: Bones™ Costume Kit

product.description: A happy haunting scene crafted of black metal. Use as a holder for pillar candles or large tealights, sold separately. With the included glass dish, use with Scented Oil or Scent Plus® Melts and a tealight, also sold separately. 5" (13 cm) h, 4 3/4" (12 cm) w.
product.name: Trick-or-Treat Fragrance Warmer

product.description: Meet the Mrs.! With her dangling earrings and lengthy lashes, she’s the perfect match for our Bones candle holder. For use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. Metal with a matte black finish. 15" (38 cm) h, 6" (15 cm) w.
product.name: Mrs. Bones™ Candle Holder

product.description: Our silly skeleton glows with the light of a votive or tealight, sold separately. Pair him with Mrs. Bones to create the cutest, creepiest Halloween couple. Metal. 15 1/2" (39 cm) h, 6" (15 cm) w.
product.name: Bones™ Candle Holder

product.description: You know what he ate last! A bone dangles inside our playful pooch skeleton. Black matte-finished metal with glass votive cup. For use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. 6" (15 cm) h, 9 1/4" (24 cm) l.
product.name: Sticks Votive Holder

product.description: Textured unscented ivory pillar radiates an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in colour and texture may occur. Burn time: 50-60 hrs.
product.name: Unscented Ivory GloLite 3" x 4" (7 x 10 cm) GloLite by PartyLite Pillar

product.description: Skeletal kitty can’t resist a fish. Black matte-finished metal with glass votive cup. For use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. 7 1/2" (19 cm) h.
product.name: Stones Votive Holder

product.description: Popular candle holders rendered in a smaller size! Fill the glass vessels with your own decorative accents and finish by adding the votive cup on top. Light from a votive or tealight, sold separately, sets the trio aglow. Set includes one of each height: 5" (13 cm), 6" (15 cm) and 7" (18 cm).
product.name: Symmetry Trio

product.description: When a tealight is burning inside the pierced metal tealight cups, your favourite Halloween motifs glow warm and bright on the outer frosted globes. One each: cat, bat, and pumpkin. 2 1/4" (6 cm) h, 3" (8 cm) dia.
product.name: Halloween Night Tealight Globes

product.description: A spooky hat that's a real scream! Look closely at the ghost that spins with the heat of the tealight! 7" (18 cm) h, 7" (18 cm) w, 7" (18 cm) depth.
product.name: Spooky Hat Tealight House

product.description: Charming vampire friend and an entourage of glittery bats gather around the glow of a tealight, sold separately. Metal. 12" (30 cm) h to top of head, 5" (13 cm) base dia.
product.name: Count Batcula™ Tealight Holder

product.description: More whimsical than wicked, our kindly witch holds a flickering tealight, sold separately. Metal with glitter accents. 13 1/4" (34 cm) h to top of hat, 5" (13 cm) base dia.
product.name: Abracadabra Witch™ Tealight Holder

product.description: Metal mesh wings unfurl mysteriously around a 4 3/4" (12 cm) h purple glass cup for use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. Remove chain for tabletop use. Overall: 14 1/2" (37 cm) h, 5" (13 cm) w.
product.name: Hanging Bat Votive Holder
